text: There is no place for life in Nagash domain, flesh will rot and bones will crumble, even earth itself rises to form great walls to deter living invaders.
The whole world will bow to the True God.
Each defeated skeleton warrior shall be replaced by ten more, as an endless sea of undead marches on.
The Power of Nagash is immeasurable, as is his hat.
We're in the end game now
This settlement has been blessed with Nagash's presence.
Can only be applied once per province and only on generic settlements.
It'll make target undead faction a vassal under Nagash

Exert your influence to seize control of this faction, turning them into a loyal [[img:icon_vassal]][[/img]]vassal. The target faction must have reached 100% [[img:icon_blood_kiss]][[/img]]vampiric Influence. The total [[img:icon_blood_kiss]][[/img]]vampiric influence required to reach this threshold depends on the targetâ€™s race and number of settlements.
